Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Number, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Date, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Entity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.TransactionType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Contract, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ReceiptDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentPurchaseOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CustomerOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CounterpartyPriceKinds, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Event, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Responsible, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnit, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Comment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PettyCash, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BankAccount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CashType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder, CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentNo, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DateOfIncomingDocument, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Author, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Inventory.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, UnitOfMeasure, Price, Amount, VATRate, VATAmount, ReceiptDate, TotalAmount ), DocumentPurchaseOrder.Materials.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, Reserve, UnitOfMeasure, ShippingDate ), DocumentPurchaseOrder.PaymentCalendar.( Ref, LineNumber, PayDate, PaymentPercentage, AmountOfPayment, PayVATAmount ), DocumentPurchaseOrder.PointInTime, InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.PurchaseOrder AS DocumentPurchaseOrder LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InvoicesAndOrdersPayment.Turnovers AS InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.InvoiceForPayment

SELECT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Number, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Date, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Entity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.TransactionType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Contract, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ReceiptDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentPurchaseOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CustomerOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CounterpartyPriceKinds, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Event, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Responsible, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnit, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Comment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PettyCash, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BankAccount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CashType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder, CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentNo, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DateOfIncomingDocument, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Author, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Inventory.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, UnitOfMeasure, Price, Amount, VATRate, VATAmount, ReceiptDate, TotalAmount ), DocumentPurchaseOrder.Materials.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, Reserve, UnitOfMeasure, ShippingDate ), DocumentPurchaseOrder.PaymentCalendar.( Ref, LineNumber, PayDate, PaymentPercentage, AmountOfPayment, PayVATAmount ), DocumentPurchaseOrder.PointInTime, InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.PurchaseOrder AS DocumentPurchaseOrder LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InvoicesAndOrdersPayment.Turnovers AS InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.InvoiceForPayment
